            background: #fff;

        }

        .card h2 {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

            margin-bottom: 14px;
        }

        .form-group label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 14px;
            margin-bottom: 6px;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .form-group input,
        .form-group select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 8px 10px;
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            border-radius: 6px;
            font-size: 14px;
        }

        button {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 10px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 6px;
            background: #007bff;
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 15px;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

            background: #0056b3;
        }

<body>

<div class="card">
    <h2>Regist Data Secure To DX</h2>

    <div class="form-group">
        <label>Type</label>
        <input type="text" id="type" value="READ_PART" readonly>
    </div>

    <div class="form-group">
        <label>Host</label>
        <select id="path">
            <!-- option để sẵn, bạn sửa sau -->
            <option value="IX6EBR784bG+M0XaJreIY7fMnc1QDb3QQcoOjzop5fUZYIjuJmQDTy+enpXr204VDpnBMrf8FFePgWXLrp6rZA==">HOST API</option>
            <option value="fWpFG2g5SBuxG5Km0x0Pjlpe7fQfbpXuCdyl0FadNF9wBCqljZNQf1g/kTdboNRw6D3V0pew5GEutRTYJBkA+Q==">HOST NORMAL</option>
        </select>
    </div>

    <div class="form-group">
        <label>IsExternal</label>
        <input type="text" id="IsExternal" value="true" readonly>
    </div>

    <div class="form-group">
        <label>Path</label>
        <select id="path">
            <!-- option để sẵn, bạn sửa sau -->
            <option value="">ListIPComeToHereTheFirst (API)</option>
            <option value="">ListIPComeHere (API)</option>
            <option value="">ListIPComeToHereTheFirst (NORMAL)</option>
            <option value="">ListIPComeHere (NORMAL)</option>
        </select>
    </div>

    <div class="form-group">
        <label>Split 1</label>
        <input type="text" id="split1" value="[R-PLAY][N-PLAY]" readonly>
    </div>

    <div class="form-group">
        <label>Split 2</label>
        <input type="text" id="split2" value="[T-PLAY]" readonly>
    </div>

    <button onclick="callApi()">Hành động</button>
</div>

<script>
    async function callApi() {
        const formData = new FormData();
        formData.append("type", document.getElementById("type").value);
        formData.append("Host", document.getElementById("Host").value);
		formData.append("IsExternal", document.getElementById("IsExternal").value);
		formData.append("path", document.getElementById("path").value);
        formData.append("split1", document.getElementById("split1").value);
        formData.append("split2", document.getElementById("split2").value);

        try {
            const response = await fetch("/Cover/RegistForSecure", {
                method: "POST",
                body: formData
            });

            const data = await response.json();

            if (data.result === true) {
                alert("Thành công!");
            }
        } catch (err) {
			alert("Đã xảy ra lỗi!");
            console.log("API error:", err);
        }
    }
</script>

</body>
</html>
